author: Katie Killen
text: The City of Shawnee, KS is trying to reinvigorate our Neighborhood Focus Program. This program has four older neighborhoods in it. We are looking at hiring a facilitator to lead each of the four neighborhoods through a goal setting meeting. Does anyone have an example RFP for this type of service that they would be willing to share? Thanks.
title: Facilitator RFP for Neighborhood Goal Setting
